content.description: Figure 1 shows a displacement-versus-time graph for the dart. Figure 2 shows a displacement-versus-time graph for the target. For both graphs, the component of the displacement is not indicated.
content.question: Which displacement component, horizontal or vertical, is represented by the graph for each object?

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
